title: Continuous Professional Development Strategies Using Social Media: Self-Regulated Learning-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on mid-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields acquiring effective self-regulated learning strategies via social media and building continuous learning systems linked to work

learning_goals: Learners can execute at least three self-regulated learning strategies—such as goal-setting, resource collection, and performance evaluation—on social media platforms.
Learners can design social media-based learning networks and knowledge-sharing activities for professional development.
Learners can propose practical strategies to address real-world challenges like time management and information overload in online learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
